topic.title: EMS Cardiac Arrest Event - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS CARDIAC ARREST EVENT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] @negationInd
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67503-3" Cardiac arrest cause (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestCause 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.10 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.02
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67502-5" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestTiming 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.91 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] informant
This informant Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="INF"
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67506-6" CPR prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation Contains zero or more [0..*] value with data type BL
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.05
This observation Contains zero or one [0..1] participant
This participant Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant Contains zero or one [0..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains zero or one [0..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67508-2" AED use prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AEDUsePriorToEMSArrival 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.13 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.07
This observation Contains zero or one [0..1] participant
This participant Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant Contains exactly one [1..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.08
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains zero or one [0..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67513-2" Return of spontaneous circulation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ReturnOfSpontaneousCirculation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.15 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.12
This entry Contains zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Such entryRelationships Contains exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
Such entryRelationships Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
Such entryRelationships Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.16 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.17
SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS CARDIAC ARREST EVENT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] @negationInd
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67503-3" Cardiac arrest cause (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestCause 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.10 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.02
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67502-5" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestTiming 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.91 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] informant
This informant Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="INF"
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67506-6" CPR prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation Contains zero or more [0..*] value with data type BL
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.05
This observation Contains zero or one [0..1] participant
This participant Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant Contains zero or one [0..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains zero or one [0..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67508-2" AED use prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AEDUsePriorToEMSArrival 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.13 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.07
This observation Contains zero or one [0..1] participant
This participant Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant Contains exactly one [1..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.08
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship Contains zero or one [0..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67513-2" Return of spontaneous circulation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ReturnOfSpontaneousCirculation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.15 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.12
This entry Contains zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Such entryRelationships Contains exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
Such entryRelationships Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
Such entryRelationships Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.16 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.17

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.14"/> <id root="1548277716" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="67799-7" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS CARDIAC ARREST EVENT"/> <title>EMS Cardiac Arrest Event</title> <entry> <observation/> </entry> </section>
